welcomeMessage:
```Hi {}, welcome to the Spaceflight Sticker Hunt!
Just to give you a general overview if you havent heard about it yet;
Spaceflight is hosting a sticker hunt competition over the weekend after October 14th in the Student Union.
Students and staff are welcome to compete and we suggest teaming up to have a better chance!
You and your team can compete against other teams to get the most points by 
finding the most stickers hidden all around the buildings!
To join in the competition you must either create or join a team!
To create or join a team please type these commands into the
 server's create-or-join-team channel!
Create Team Command:  !createteam <Team Name>   (Ex: !createteam SisMan!)
Join   Team Command:    !jointeam <Team Name>   (Ex:   !jointeam SisMan!)
This will let you join your private team dm where you can confirm found
stickers and add the points to your team score, its pretty neat!
More information can be found in the information tab which will be unlocked
after creating/joining a team, or you can contact a sticker person for more help!
Best of Luck and Good Hunting, youre gonna need it!
P.S. for later use after creating a team heres a reminder of other commands:
Enter a code: !code <sticker> <authCode>
See the score of your team: !score
Get a hint: !hint
All of these and more can be found by doing !help in any channel!```

noAccess: Looks like you don't have access to this command.
newTeamMessage:
Welcome to your team chat! This is where your team can submit sticker images and claim points
You can also ask for hints on golden tickets after you have found 20 stickers! 
This chat also allows your team to check your score and sticker count. 

**To claim points** you have to use the **Code Command** and you can access it in this fashion 
First upload a photo of the found sticker and then use the command below based on the codes on the sticker.
!code   <sticker> <authCode>
Example: !code EXAMPLECODE KEY123 

**To Check Score** you have to use the **Score Command** which is explaine below:
!score
This should return the points and the sticker count for your team!

How Hints Work!

Use !hint to request a new hint.
Hints are available evry 30 minutes, or every time you find a new sticker.
If you find 20 stickers, I will give you a hint to find a shiny gold sticker, which is worth 5 points! You only get one of these per hunt, so make sure to not waste it!

More information can be found in the information folder and dming the staff!
Please read the info before dming the staff because your answer may be found there!
helpMessage:
```Debug Commands:
	ping - Gives bot's ping.
	status - Gives bot's status.
Standard Commands:
	code - Submits a sticker code. Usage: !code <name> <key>
	createteam - Creates a new team. Usage: !createteam <name>
	help - This command.
	hint - Gives hints.
	jointeam - Join an existing team. Usage: !jointeam <name>
	score - Reports your team's score.```
modHelpMessage:
```Standard Moderation Commands:
	createchannel - Creates a team channel. Usage: !createchannel <name>
	giverole - Gives a user a role. Usage: !giverole <@user> <role>
	keepinventory - Kills the bot and dumps the necessary files into the backups channel.
	kill - Kills the bot.
	removeteam - Removes a team or a list of teams from the server and database. Usage: !removeteam <name> <name> ...
	scoreboard - Sends the scoreboard (only works in the scoreboard channel).
Data Editing Commands:
	addsticker - Adds a new sticker. Usage: !addsticker <sticker> <authCode> <points> <hint>
	addstickers - Adds a set of new stickers. Usage: !addstickers <sticker> <authCode> <points> <hint>, etc
	addfromfile - Adds all stickers from a csv. Usage: !addfromfile (Attach the csv)
	removesticker - Removes a sticker. Usage: !removesticker <sticker> <authCode>
	changestickername - Changes a sticker's name. Usage: !changestickername <sticker> <authCode> <new sticker> <new authCode>
	changestickerhint - Changes a sticker's hint. Usage: !changestickerhint <sticker> <authCode> <hint>
	changestickerpoints - Changes a sticker's points. Usage: !changestickerpoints <sticker> <authCode> <points>
	changeteamname - Changes a team's name. Usage: !changeteamname <team> <new team>
	addlocation - Adds a location to the database. Usage: !addlocation <building> <floors>
	addstickertolocation - Adds a sticker to a location. Usage: !addstickertolocation <building> <floor> <name> <code> <location>
	addstickerstolocation - Adds a set of stickers to loctaions. Usage: !addstickerstolocation <building> <floor> <name> <code> <location>, etc
	removestickerfromlocation - Removes a sticker from a location. Usage: !removestickerfromlocation <building> <floor> <name> <code>
	clearlocation - Removes all stickers from a location. Usage: !clearlocation <building> <floor> (optional)
	showlocations - Outputs all locations. Usage: !showlocations <team name> (optional)```
